title: The Second Summer of the Sisterhood
description: The second novel in the wildly popular #1 New York Times bestselling Sisterhood of the Traveling Pants series, from the author of The Whole Thing Together and The Here and Now. With a bit of last summer’s sand in the pockets, the Traveling Pants and the sisterhood who wears them—Lena, Tibby, Bridget, and Carmen—embark on their second summer together. Pants = love. Love your pals. Love yourself.“Light and romantic." —The New York Times  “Fits like a favorite pair of pants.” —USA Today “A great summer read.” —The Sacramento Bee  “As comfortable as an old pair of jeans.” —Kirkus Reviews, Starred
author: Ann Brashares
